title: Payment for two gas vessels on Monday (23)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro gas said it will pay for two more gas vessels today (23).
The Chairman of Litro gas Eng. Vijitha Herath said that 80,000 gas cylinders were distributed to consumers on Sunday (22).
However, there are still long queues in many parts of the island to obtain gas.
